name: Edition 6/22 tarot card - The Hierophant
description:
Size: 2362 x 4725 px
This edition card will be released every Friday.

Hey, are you looking for a purpose in life? That means you have to meet The Hierophant soon! He will guide you so that you can aware of the real meanings and mysteries of life until you finally know the true purpose of life.

Known as The Teacher of Wisdom, he is stood between two pillars symbolizing law (obedience) and liberty (disobedience) with two worshippers beside him. His right hand was raised in benediction with two fingers pointing skyward and two pointing down, thus forming a bridge between Heaven and Earth. Meanwhile, his left hand held a triple cross. Psssttt… You will be surprised to hear this secret: The Hierophant holds the key to Heaven!

The Hierophant is character number 5 in the Major Arcana. One thing that not many people know is that he is a counterpart to "The High Priestess”.

*This item is available only as a Non-Fungible Token (NFT). It’s strictly prohibited to steal and reduplicate this NFT item.
